title: Space invaders: sexual harassment at work (Captioned)
brief_description: Sexual harassment at work is today recognised as one of the most pressing of all issues facing management. This series of seven trigger films, (2 mins. each), is designed to help men and women in the workplace come to terms with sexual harassment and re-align their own attitudes and behaviour.
